queries.query: SELECT *, vorname FROM schueler
SELECT id, vorname AS 'Rufname', MAX(geburtsdatum) FROM schueler
SELECT * FROM schueler ORDER BY vorname DESC, nachname ASC , MAX(geburtsdatum) DESC
SELECT * FROM schueler LIMIT 10 OFFSET 15
SELECT id, vorname AS 'Rufname', MAX(geburtsdatum) AS maxxi, COUNT(klasse.id) FROM schueler
SELECT id, LENGTH(vorname) AS 'Vorname Laenge', MAX(geburtsdatum) AS max, COUNT(klasse.id), UPPER(nachname) FROM schueler
SELECT LENGTH(vorname), SUBSTR('strasse','1','4') AS 'Teil von Strasse' FROM schueler

SELECT * FROM schueler
WHERE vorname LIKE 'An%' AND id < '50'

SELECT * FROM schueler
WHERE vorname LIKE 'An%' OR id BETWEEN '1' AND '5' AND id IN ( '2', '55', '4' )

SELECT * FROM schueler
WHERE id < '50' AND  ( vorname LIKE 'A%' OR vorname LIKE 'B%' )

SELECT vorname, nachname from schueler
where LENGTH(vorname) <= 8

SELECT schueler.vorname, schueler.nachname, klasse.name FROM schueler
JOIN klassen ON klassen.id = schueler.klasse_id

SELECT schueler.* FROM schueler
JOIN klassen ON klassen.id = schueler.klasse_id
WHERE schueler.id IN ( '1', '2') OR schueler.vorname LIKE 'Richi'

SELECT schueler.*, klasse.name FROM schueler
join klasse klasse_1 ON klasse.id = schueler.klasse_id
join lehrer ON lehrer.klasse_id = klasse_1.id
WHERE vorname LIKE 'An%' OR id BETWEEN '1' AND '5' AND id IN ( '2', '55', '4' )

SELECT schueler.*, klasse.name FROM schueler
join klasse klasse_1 ON klasse.id = schueler.klasse_id
join lehrer ON lehrer.klasse_id = klasse_1.id
WHERE vorname LIKE 'An%' OR id BETWEEN '1' AND '5' AND id IN ( '2', '55', '4' )
ORDER BY vorname DESC, nachname ASC , MAX(geburtsdatum) DESC

CREATE TABLE 'schueler' (
'id' INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
'vorname' TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE 'schueler' (
'id' INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
'vorname' TEXT,
'nachname' TEXT UNIQUE
)

CREATE TABLE 'schueler' (
'id' INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
'vorname' TEXT,
'nachname' TEXT,
'klasse_id' INTEGER,
FOREIGN KEY (klasse_id) REFERENCES klassen(id)
)

CREATE TABLE 'klassen' (
'id' INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
'name' TEXT,
'lehrer_id' INTEGER,
'schueler_id' INTEGER,
FOREIGN KEY (lehrer_id) REFERENCES lehrer(id),
FOREIGN KEY (schueler_id) REFERENCES schueler(id)
)
INSERT INTO lehrer (id) VALUES ('5')
INSERT INTO lehrer (id, vorname) VALUES ('5', 'Richi')
UPDATE lehrer SET vorname  =  'Richi'

UPDATE lehrer SET vorname  =  'Richi',
name =  'Muller',
klasse_id =  '2'

UPDATE lehrer SET vorname  =  'Richi'
WHERE id = '6'

UPDATE lehrer SET vorname  =  'Richi',
name =  'Muller',
klasse_id =  '2'
WHERE id = '6'

UPDATE lehrer SET vorname  =  'Richi'
WHERE id < '6' AND vorname LIKE 'A%'

UPDATE lehrer SET vorname  =  'Richi'
WHERE id < '6' AND vorname LIKE 'A%' OR nachname = 'MÃ¼ller'
DELETE FROM lehrer

DELETE FROM lehrer
where id = 10

DELETE FROM lehrer
where id < 10 and vorname like 'An%'
DROP TABLE lehrer
DROP TABLE lehrer_schule
ALTER TABLE klassen
ALTER TABLE klassen DROP COLUMN name
ALTER TABLE klassen RENAME TO 'klassen_neu'
ALTER TABLE klassen RENAME name TO 'klassenname'
ALTER TABLE klassen ADD COLUMN 'klassenart' INTEGER
